'''1.13-pre10''' is the tenth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on July 17, 2018,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-113-pre-release|Minecraft 1.13 pre-release 10|July 17, 2018}}</ref> which brings changes to corals, adds optimized world option and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
[[File:1.13-pre10 Optimizing World.png|thumb|The world converter process.]]
'''General'''
* When editing an existing world, there is now a new "Optimize World" button, allowing you to update old worlds to a newer format.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Coral]]'''
* Now requires [[Silk Touch]] in order to be obtained.

'''[[Coral fan]]s and [[dead coral fan]]s'''
* Now drops when mined with [[Silk Touch]].

=== Mobs ===
* Mobs can no longer stand in the most shallow form of flowing water.

=== World generation ===
[[Ocean monument]]s no longer generate in existing chunks.

=== Command format ===
'''Team '''
* Option <code>friendlyfire</code> capitalization changed to <code>friendlyFire</code>.

=== General ===
'''[[Settings]]'''
* Option <code>Fullscreen resolution</code> capitalization changed to <code>Fullscreen Resolution</code>.

== Trivia ==
* This is the only time there has been a tenth pre-release for a version.
* This is also the highest number that pre-releases have gotten to ever, as well as being the only time the pre-release counter has reached double digits.
